name: circuit-breaker-graphql-examples
description: GraphQL API examples for Circuit Breaker LLM Router

scripts.all: npm run workflow && npm run agents && npm run llm && npm run analytics && npm run rules && npm run nats
scripts.validate: npm run test && echo 'All examples validated successfully'
scripts.demo:
npm run workflow && echo '
--- Workflow Demo Complete ---' && npm run agents && echo '
--- Agents Demo Complete ---' && npm run llm && echo '
--- LLM Demo Complete ---'
scripts.quick-test: npm run workflow && npm run analytics

author: Circuit Breaker Team
